page.title: 19Mosshayne Farm 2011
page.content:
I worked at Mosshayne for 35 yrs and still live on the farm, The farm now milks 250 cows, it stoped growing potatoes about 10 yrs ago When I came here in 1975 there were five farms between us and Exeter, we arre now the nearest farm on this side of the City! Sadly all the rest of the land has been built on, in the not to distant future this farm may be built on too.
David
